item.description:
Evening Lecture Series One Artist's Experience: From Art Creation to Gallery Representation

Presented By: Jane Maxwell

(new date: March 2 (POSTPONED from February 2, due to snow))
Newton artist, Jane Maxwell, is represented nationally and internationally by multiple galleries and at art fairs, and her work has been collected by patrons all over the world. Jane has had enormous commercial success, which she attributes to a strong concept, a unique technique, and an understanding of the marketplace. Jane will share her professional journey, including ideas to help make your art more commercially viable.

Registration Code: AR113719 $10.00 per person.

 

March 2, 2011 from 7:00 PM to 8:30 PM

Location: New Art Center

Event Fee: $10.00
Register by and save $0.00
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a small Meetup sign.
item.why: Here's a special Meetup for the artists in the group. It's last minute, but it looks good for any artist interested in jump starting their art careers.
item.name: One Artist's Experience
